chatbot.modules.v1.StructuredOutputUi.js.description: StructuredOutputUi defines UI rendering configuration for structured outputs.

dataPath.description: Path to the data in the output (e.g., "flights")

enabled.description: Whether to render output as interactive UI components

isArray.description: Whether the data contains multiple items

itemConfig.description: JSON configuration for rendering each item

chatbot.modules.v1.StructuredOutputUi.js.title: Structured Output Ui
